name: maps_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Google Maps in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling maps_search_places multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'cafes in Berlin,restaurants in Berlin,bars in Berlin'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'pizza in NYC,sushi in LA,tacos in Austin')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const feed = document.querySelector('[role="feed"]'); if (!feed) return { results: [] }; const items = feed.querySelectorAll('div[jsaction] a[href*="/maps/place/"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (const link of items) { if (results.length >= 5) break; const href = link.href; if (seen.has(href)) continue; seen.add(href); const container = link.closest('div[jsaction]'); const nameEl = container ? container.querySelector('.fontHeadlineSmall, .qBF1Pd') : null; const ratingEl = container ? container.querySelector('span[role="img"]') : null; results.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') : '', url: href }); } return { query: decodeURIComponent(window.location.href.split('/search/')[1] || '').split('?')[0], result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
